title: Eric Holder | Trump's Sharpie Scandal Has Triggered Multiple Investigations: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the growing scandal of President Trump doctoring a map of Hurricane Dorian with a Sharpie.

Then, Seth talks to former U.S. attorney general Eric Holder. Holder also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
